Packed by us

  • Surfboards (hard top and foam)
  •  Rash guards
  •  Surf wax
  • Life Jackets
Packed by you
  • Wetsuit (recommend 3/2 neoprene)
  • Personal Surfboard (optional)
  • Swim suit
  • Closed-toed hiking shoes
  • Day pack
  • Rain coat
Recommended
  • Sunscreen
  • Hat
  • Sunglasses
  • Water bottle
  • Sweatshirt
